```{r}
#Read Data
obs = read.csv("observation.csv")
est = read.csv("estimation.csv")

#exp1A
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
exp1A.est = filter(est, experiment == "exp1A")
exp1A.est.test = filter(exp1A.est, sequence_type =="test")
exp1A.est.test.bAvg = filter(exp1A.est.test, condition == "sparse_below_average")
exp1A.est.test.aAvg = filter(exp1A.est.test, condition == "sparse_above_average")
exp1A.est.test.bAvg <- transform(exp1A.est.test.bAvg, normalized = delta_estimate/scale_range)
exp1A.est.test.aAvg <- transform(exp1A.est.test.aAvg, normalized = delta_estimate/scale_range)
```


```{r}
t.test(exp1A.est.test.bAvg$normalized, exp1A.est.test.aAvg$normalized, var.equal = TRUE)
```
```{r}
library(lsr)
cohensD(exp1A.est.test.bAvg$normalized, exp1A.est.test.aAvg$normalized)
```
